caption:
Struggling with thinning hair?
FOLIGAIN® has you covered.

Our 5% Minoxidil Topical Solution for Men helps reactivate hair follicles and promote regrowth at the root level — clinically proven, fast-absorbing, and easy to use.

Pair it with FOLIGAIN® Shampoo with 2% Minoxidil and Trioxidil®, our advanced triple-action formula that nourishes the scalp, strengthens hair, and supports visibly thicker, healthier-looking hair.

Shop at FOLIGAIN.com

Stronger together. Fuller hair, real results.
